Uses of Class
io.permazen.schema.SchemaModel

  • Packages that use SchemaModel 
    Package Description
    io.permazen
    Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
    io.permazen.core
    Core classes for the Permazen Java persistence layer.
    io.permazen.jsck
    Classes associated with Jsck, the Permazen key/value database consistency checker.
    io.permazen.maven
    Permazen Maven plugins.
    io.permazen.schema
    Classes for modeling Permazen Database schemas.

    • Uses of SchemaModel in io.permazen

      SchemaModel Permazen.getSchemaModel()
      Get the SchemaModel associated with this instance, derived from the annotations on the scanned classes.

      Get the SchemaModel configured for this instance.
